    • Method Detail

      • getDatabase

        static Database getDatabase​(String ip,
                            String port,
                            String user,
                            String pass)
        Method that gets a fully configured connection to the database
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP address of server
        port - The port on the server
        user - The user ID to use
        pass - The password to use
        Returns:
        the db object created in which we are connecting

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect()
        Method that closes the current connection to data database, if it exists
        Returns:
        true if connection closes as expected

      • insertRow

        int insertRow​(String subject,
              String message,
              int user)
        Method that inserts a row into the database. These rows are the user-inputted subject+message
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject for this new row
        message - The message body for this new row
        user - user who will post
        Returns:
        The number of rows that were inserted

      • selectAll

        ArrayList<Database.RowData> selectAll()
        Method that queries the database for a list of all subjects and their IDs
        Returns:
        All rows, as an ArrayList

        Method that gets all the data for a specific row, by ID
        Parameters:
        id - The id being requested
        Returns:
        the data for the requested row, null otherwise

        Method that deletes a row by ID
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the number of rows deleted, -1 if error

        Returns:
        the number of rows udpated, -1 on error

      • insertUser

        int insertUser​(String username,
               String email,
               String sub,
               String note)
        Method that inserts a user into the database. These users are the user-inputted subject+message with null values for nonessential attribues
        Parameters:
        username - The subject for this new row
        email - The message body for this new row
        sub - The sub for this new row
        note - The note for this new row
        Returns:
        The number of rows that were inserted

        Returns:
        the number of users deleted, -1 if error

                  int gender,
                  String so,

                  int id)

        Parameters:
        username - The name of the new user
        gender - The gender of the new user
        so - The so of the new user
        note - The bio/note of the new user
        id - The id of the new user
        Returns:
        the number of users deleted, -1 if error

        post_id - The post_id for this new comment
        userid - The userid for this new comment
        Returns:
        The number of rows that were inserted

      • updateComment

        int updateComment​(String message,
                  int id,
                  int userid)
        Method that updates a comment in the database
        Parameters:
        message - The message of the comment to that will replace an old one
        id - The id of the comment to be replaced
        userid - The user who left this comment
        Returns:
        the number of rows udpated, -1 on error

        userid - The id of the user who voted unwantedly
